overview: To satisfy their husbands, these beautiful creatures obediently begin their initiation into a world of wild debauchery. In chic high society surroundings, these gorgeous married women are about to discover their husbands' perverted fantasies, which seem to know no bounds. Swinging, debauchery, voyeurism and candaulism are all means for them to discover new horizons of pleasure. To ease her into her initiation, Julie's husband has invited a couple of friends to the house. The evening of group pleasure which is about to unfold will be the first of many sexual experiences for Julie, which will end with her being taken and fucked in the ass in succession by three strangers under the excited gaze of her husband.
tagline: Married women willing to satisfy their husbands
title: Luxure: The Education of my Wife
